function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of virtual conversational agents and avatars in e-commerce may create a false sense of security regarding disease transmission.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of voice assistant technology in cooking apps may lead to cross-contamination of devices in the kitchen.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical interaction with ar installations and shared smartphone usage can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission through physical contact with payment devices and surfaces in stores.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to contact with products in stores.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of voice assistants and social robots may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases by allowing interactions without physical contact.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virtual reality and holographic technology may create an illusion of physical presence, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing measures.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sending food to healthcare workers in various hospitals may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene measures are not taken in the food preparation and delivery process.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging face-to-face transactions in branch for certain transactions could increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in bank branches due to lack of social distancing and contact reduction measures.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long-term performance of the botanical air filtration system","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overestimation of indoor plant air purification capabilities based on chamber studies","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential microbial growth related to vocs becoming a carbon source for soil microbial communities in plant rhizosphere","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate methods for volatile organic compounds vocs removal from indoor air","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of indoor air quality improvement methods","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral clumping and associations with suspended proteins may cause variability in viral particle size.","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adenovirus is the most resistant to 254 nm uv-c and requires high uv doses for complete inactivation.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data on uv inactivation of viral aerosols","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of linear relationship between uv dose and percent survival","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of nebulization and liquid impingement on the survival of animal viruses","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of viruses due to aerosolization and sampling","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enveloped viruses like mhv coronavirus are susceptible to inactivation by mechanical stress.","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aerosolization and sampling can lead to survival of infectious viruses, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in survival rates of viruses in different suspension media can impact disease transmission","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to viral aerosols during chamber maintenance and operation.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling of infectious viral samples in the laboratory","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to viral aerosols during experimental procedures","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of viral samples and contaminated materials","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and cultivation of bacteriophage ms2 and e. coli c3000 may pose a risk of accidental exposure and infection.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne spread of new pathogens such as sars coronavirus and influenza virus","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of sars-cov-2, influenza a, and legionella pneumophila transmission through indoor air","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to uv-c radiation for maintenance personnel or occupants if not properly shielded or turned off during maintenance.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pathogens transmitted through the air","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of inactivation rate on pathogen type and environment","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health risks from direct exposure to uv-c radiation","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenge in achieving community immunity through vaccination due to rejection of vaccines and high pre-vaccination rate requirement.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to modify internal conditions leading to heat stress in humans and reduced resistance to infection.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 virus from humans to humans through infectious droplets","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Asymptomatic patients with covid-19 releasing infectious droplets","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 virus remaining infectious on surfaces and in indoor air","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of disease transmission through overcrowding in green spaces","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of reduced beneficial health effects due to overcrowding in green spaces","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased pedestrian and cyclist activity in green areas during lockdown may lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift from work-related commutes to recreational cycling outside the more densely built city center may lead to higher risk of disease transmission in recreational areas.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in recreational use on remote trails due to social distancing advisories","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sar-cov-2 in densely populated urban areas","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difusión de noticias falsas e información poco rigurosa","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"La difusión rápida de información errónea a través de las redes sociales durante brotes de enfermedades","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"La infodemia en las redes sociales, que difunde información poco rigurosa y contribuye a sentimientos de paranoia y miedo.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting observational studies during a pandemic may pose a risk of exposure to the virus for researchers and participants.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
